sentence in indonesian using the words: Seseorang perlu berusaha untuk mendapatkannya.
english translation: "Someone needs to work to get it."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Segala sesuatu akan baik-baik saja.
english translation: "Everything will be fine."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Posisi rumah terletak di pinggir kota.
english translation: "The house is located on the outskirts of the city."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku itu tersimpan dalam lemari.
english translation: "The book is stored in the closet."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu menangis karena sangat bahagia.
english translation: "Mom cries because she is very happy."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak itu tahu bahwa dia melakukan sesuatu yang salah.
english translation: "The child knows that he did something wrong."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia merasa tekanan untuk menyelesaikan proyek di waktu yang singkat.
english translation: "She feels pressure to finish the project in a short time."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya membeli baju baru kemarin.
english translation: "I bought a new shirt yesterday."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Andaikata saya bisa kembali ke masa lalu dan mengubah segalanya.
english translation: "If only I could go back in time and change everything."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia dianggap sebagai ahli dalam bidangnya.
english translation: "He is considered an expert in his field."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak-anak senang bermain di taman.
english translation: "Children love to play in the park."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buku ini milik saya.
english translation: "This book belongs to me."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya rasa tidak, sebaliknya saya pikir itu buruk.
english translation: "I don't think so, on the other hand I think that's bad."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hasil yang diharapkan tidak didapat.
english translation: "The expected result was not obtained."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kiranya besok saya bisa melihat Anda.
english translation: "Maybe tomorrow I can see you."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya tidak suka kopi hitam.
english translation: "I don't like black coffee."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Mari kita bekerja bersama untuk menyelesaikan proyek ini.
english translation: "Let's work together to complete this project."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya sedang mencari kunci mobil saya.
english translation: "I am looking for my car keys."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Seseorang tidak menjadi besar hanya dengan berbicara.
english translation: "A person does not become great just by talking."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menyukai buah-buahan segar, khususnya anggur.
english translation: "I like fresh fruit, especially grapes."
